body:
Comment 6 by **jeff.allen**: 
Revision caf67c33ada8 broke "go tool pprof" for Linux; it now says this on start:

usage: addr2line binary
reads addresses from standard input and writes two lines for each:
	function name
	file:line
Welcome to pprof!  For help, type 'help'.

And then it does not correctly print symbols, only addresses. I'm looking into what the
fix is, and will post a CL shortly.
